name: Alleviate
description: Chant a quick prayer to heal yourself for 10 to 17 HP.

name: Afflict
description: Afflict your enemies with suffering, dealing 8 to 12 damage.

name: Entrance
description: Attempt to entrace your enemies, putting them to sleep for 1 to 3 turns.

name: Illuminate
description: Illuminate your path, eliminating the need to carry a torch.

name: Silence
description: Cast this spell on magic using foes to silence them, preventing spellcasting for 1 to 3 turns.

name: Weaken
description: Cast this spell to decrease your enemy's Attack Power and Defence by 25%.

name: Teleout
description: Teleport to the entrance of caves.

name: Intimidate
description: Intimidates all enemies you would encounter to flee on sight.

name: Revivify
description: Commune with the gods, healing yourself for 85 to 100 HP.

name: Destroy
description: A devastating spell that decimates your enemies, dealing 58 to 65 damage.
